entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 7:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: SW 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this evening then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
